EntryName	STR3N_HUMAN
ProteinName	STARD3 N-terminal-like protein (MLN64 N-terminal domain homolog)
GeneName	STARD3NL MENTHO UNQ855/PRO1864
Length	227
Function	Tethering protein that creates contact site between the endoplasmic reticulum and late endosomes: localizes to late endosome membranes and contacts the endoplasmic reticulum via interaction with VAPA and VAPB (PubMed:24105263).
Subcellular Location	Late endosome membrane
